short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps Sku Grid users to update price & stock on Facebook Marketplace based on supplier’s data at Sku Grid.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps Sku Grid users to update price & stock information on Facebook Marketplace based on supplier’s data at Sku Grid. To use this extension you must have configured Facebook Marketplace at Sku Grid and added your items from Facebook Marketplace to Sku Grid’s inventory.
